Swing Up Smc¶

Overview¶

This module provides the SwingUpSMC class for swing up smc functionality.

Examples¶

>>> from src.controllers.swing_up_smc import *
>>> # Initialize SMC controller with default parameters
>>> controller = SwingUpSMC()

API Summary¶

src.controllers.swing_up_smc

Detailed API¶

class src.controllers.swing_up_smc.SwingUpSMC(dynamics_model, stabilizing_controller, energy_gain=50.0, switch_energy_factor=0.95, exit_energy_factor=0.9, switch_angle_tolerance=0.35, reentry_angle_tolerance=None, dt=0.01, max_force=None, **_)[source]¶

Bases: object

Energy-based swing-up + handoff to a stabilizing controller with hysteresis.

Modes:

  • ‘swing’: u = k_swing * cos(theta1) * theta1_dot

  • ‘stabilize’: delegate to provided SMC-like controller

Hysteresis:
  • ‘swing’ -> ‘stabilize’ when

    E_about_bottom >= switch_energy_factor * E_bottom

    AND |theta1|, |theta2| <= switch_angle_tolerance.

  • ‘stabilize’ -> ‘swing’ when

    E_about_bottom < exit_energy_factor * E_bottom

    AND (|theta1| > reentry_angle_tolerance OR |theta2| > reentry_angle_tolerance).

Parameters:

  • dynamics_model (Any)

  • stabilizing_controller (Any)

  • energy_gain (float)

  • switch_energy_factor (float)

  • exit_energy_factor (float)

  • switch_angle_tolerance (float)

  • reentry_angle_tolerance (Optional[float])

  • dt (float)

  • max_force (Optional[float])

  • _ (Any)

__init__(dynamics_model, stabilizing_controller, energy_gain=50.0, switch_energy_factor=0.95, exit_energy_factor=0.9, switch_angle_tolerance=0.35, reentry_angle_tolerance=None, dt=0.01, max_force=None, **_)[source]¶

Initialize controller.

Parameters:

  • dynamics_model (Any) – Plant/dynamics with total_energy(state).

  • stabilizing_controller (Any) – Inner SMC-like controller after handoff.

  • energy_gain (float) – Swing-up gain (k_swing).

  • switch_energy_factor (float) – Forward handoff threshold as a fraction of E_bottom.

  • exit_energy_factor (float) – Lower threshold to exit stabilize back to swing (hysteresis).

  • switch_angle_tolerance (float) – Angle gate (rad) for forward handoff on q1, q2.

  • reentry_angle_tolerance (float | None) – Angle gate on exit; defaults to switch_angle_tolerance.

  • dt (float) – Simulation step (s).

  • max_force (float | None) – Optional saturation (N); defaults to stabilizer’s if available.

  • _ (Any)

Return type:

None
